Find My Next Course

By Inference

A modern web application designed to help students explore KTH’s course offerings with ease and precision.

View on GitHub InferenceKTH/Find-My-Next-Course

About the Project

Find My Next Course is a cutting-edge web application designed to empower students in navigating KTH’s course offerings. With an intuitive interface, students can search courses, check prerequisites, and discover eligible courses by uploading their academic transcripts. Ready to explore? Try it out now! Currently tailored for KTH, our vision is to expand to other universities, creating a versatile platform for students worldwide to explore, compare, and plan their academic journeys.

Key Features

  • Search and filter KTH courses by subject, level, and prerequisites.
  • Upload transcripts for personalized course recommendations.
  • Simple, intuitive design for seamless course discovery.
  • Open-source and regularly updated with new features.
